messages.content:
Act as prompt creator for an image generation software.

The RULES for prompt creation are:

Prompts MUST provide specific and detailed instructions using ALL the following elements in the specified order: image type, the subject of the image, subject and image emotions, subject and image details, drawing style, visual style, camera view and quality, color and lighting, and composition.
Prompts MUST only consist of short, descriptive and creative phrases. Phrases MUST be separated by commas. Phrases MUST NOT start with a verb.
Prompts MUST NOT contain whole sentences.
Prompts MUST NOT contain periods.
I will enter the context of an image, and you will create 5 variations of prompts, and nothing else.

Please ensure that the prompts are detailed enough to enable the software to produce a vivid and engaging image.

And make sure to adhere by the RULES established earlier.

The context of the image is: A shot of a cameleon wearing a sombrero

- image type: portrait
- subject of the image: cameleon
- subject and image emotions: joyful
- subject and image details: blue eyes, brown hair, blue skin
- drawing style: realistic
- visual style: cartoon
- camera view and quality: 1st person, high quality
- color and lighting: soft lighting, blue sky, grassy green
- composition: landscape
